greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum_{k=1..n} floor(n^2/k).
comment: Sums of rows of triangle in A118013.
Generalized sequence: a(n)= Sum_{k=1..n} floor((k*t + n^2)/k) = t*n + Sum_{k=1..n} floor(n^2/k) = t*A000027(n)+ A118014(n). This sequence has t=0. [From _Ctibor O. Zizka_, Feb 14 2009]
formula: a(n) ~ (gamma + log(n)) * n^2, where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Dec 22 2020
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 10 2006
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 28 2008
